code: export default function getRandomInt(min,max,n){var minInt=Math.ceil(min);var maxInt=Math.floor(max);var nn=n===undefined?1:Math.min(maxInt-minInt,n);if(maxInt-minInt<nn){throw new Error('Requested sample larger than integer range!');}var sample=Array(nn);for(var i=0;i<nn;i++){var filled=false;var _loop=function _loop(){var newRand=Math.floor(Math.random()*(maxInt-minInt))+minInt;if(sample.findIndex(function(el){return el===newRand;})===-1){sample[i]=newRand;filled=true;}};while(!filled){_loop();}}return sample;}
